title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Remote Veterinary Technology Education Program: Through Creative Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic animal physiology and veterinary terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can simulate basic veterinary procedures (temperature measurement, wound disinfection) in remote environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can collaborate with peers on blended learning platforms to analyze animal patient care cases and propose solutions
Learners can achieve at least 75 points (out of 100) in formative assessment items of the veterinary skills certification evaluation at the end of the one-week course
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
